alert.note: Alert for Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 24 at 10:16PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following county, Stone. * WHEN...Until 115 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1010 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding in areas west of Wiggins MS including areas along and near State Highway 26. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wiggins, Texas and Bond.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
